FOOTER.TAGLINE: Happy Fitness is always with you, and you can contact us anytime

SUBTITLE: Happy Rashaka Company was founded in Saudi Arabia to promote health awareness and nutrition culture among the Arab community.
CONTENT_P1: Al-Rashaqa Al-Sa‘eeda Company was established in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia based on its mission to spread health awareness and promote healthy nutritional culture throughout the Arab community in general, and the Saudi community in particular. Healthy nutrition is considered the foundation for building a society free from health issues related to overweight, such as diabetes, high blood pressure, and others. In line with Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030, Al-Rashaqa Al-Sa‘eeda has taken it upon itself to promote health awareness and focus on sports and healthy nutrition.
CONTENT_P2: In the framework of its plan to correct health awareness and ideal nutrition, Al-Rashaqa Al-Sa‘eeda Company managed, in the first quarter of 2016, to reach more than 3,000 clients at its first and second branches and continues to pursue its noble mission. By 2019, the total number of Al-Rashaqa Al-Sa‘eeda’s clients exceeded 75,000, who benefited from our services. By 2023, the number of Al-Rashaqa branches had reached 23 across the Kingdom, with 250,000 subscribed clients, in addition to hundreds of thousands who benefited from the free services.
